posts.post_content:
They hadn't even printed Shanodin Dryads since Seventh Edition. Bizarre that we'd see this in 2011.  
  
Not sure it's even worth a slot in such a deck, but it could find use in a ![Green](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=G&type=symbol)![Blue](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=U&type=symbol) deck with big green stompers, control and land manipulation effects (like [Reef Shaman](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Reef Shaman)'s ability).  
  
Of course you could just as soon put a [Whispersilk Cloak](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Whispersilk Cloak) on something to make it unblockable regardless of what lands anyone controls.
posts.html:
They hadn't even printed Shanodin Dryads since Seventh Edition. Bizarre that we'd see this in 2011.

Not sure it's even worth a slot in such a deck, but it could find use in a deck with big green stompers, control and land manipulation effects (like Reef Shaman's ability).

Of course you could just as soon put a Whispersilk Cloak on something to make it unblockable regardless of what lands anyone controls.
